title: Of Course, I’ll Claim Palimony! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Brother Complex   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Domestic Affairs   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Money Grubber   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Sister Complex   Villainess Noble Girls   Wealthy Characters
author: Soy
description:
I am the strong-willed Earl’s daughter, Yulias, who loves making money and loathes the thought of losing any due to my spirit of enterprise.

I knew my fiancé was a person with a bad head but I never thought that it was to that extent.

If you plan to annul our engagement, I will gladly receive the consolation money for it.

Let’s annul the engagement.>
